DOC.brief_summary: A Multi-Center, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Parallel-Group Study
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence and Safety of Azelaic Acid 15% Topical Gel
DOC.detailed_description: A Multi-Center, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Parallel-Group Study, comparing AZELAIC ACID TOPICAL GEL 15% TO FINACEA® and both active treatments to a Placebo Control in the treatment of Moderate of Facial Rosacea.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or nonpregnant female ≥ 18 yearsofage with a clinical diagnosis of moderate facial rosacea; Subjects had to have a definite clinical diagnosis of facial rosacea severity Grade 3 as per the IGE Female subjects who were pregnant, nursing, or planning to become pregnant during study participation;
